response.overview: This film cuts together archival footage of Commonwealth Games athletes, spectators, and administrators with images of economic and promotional activity in various British colonies and commonwealth states, drawing attention to the fact that the Games are implicated in an ongoing political project, centuries in the making.  The film was played on screens outside stadiums during the Commonwealth Games (This description was copied from the Carnegie Museum of Art 2024 Film Series program)
response.title: The Same Track
